title:
Click to view in: Tamil





srI mahaagaNapathE
sahitya:
Shree mahaa | gaNapatE || 



Shree Valla | -Bhaapathe || (Shree maha) 







anupallavi 







Saamakeerta | -anathe || 



Suranootha na | -mosthuthe || (Shree maha) 







caraNam







Taamarasa | Dhala Neetra || 



Taamasathi | Mirameetra || 



Naama mahi | -tha nandha  || 



Niga mani | Rathi chandra  || 



Thvama mo | -ga pallaya-  || 



-kee sadha | -kruthi bhajee || 



Hema maani Vibhushana | Komala Nalini charana || 



Saamajanana Varanana | Ramachandra Charana || (Shree maha)
